argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | methaus.1 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- U. J = U. J |
| 3 | 2 | #P_2ndcsep | |- ( J e. 2ndc -> E. x e. ~P U. J ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = U. J ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_mopnuni | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> X = U. J ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_pweqd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ~P X = ~P U. J ) |
| 6 | 4 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X <-> ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = U. J ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) <-> ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = U. J ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_rexeqbidv | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( E. x e. ~P X ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) <-> E. x e. ~P U. J ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = U. J ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_syl5ibr | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( J e. 2ndc -> E. x e. ~P X ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_elpwi | |- ( x e. ~P X -> x C_ X ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_met2ndci | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ ( x C_ X /\ x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) ) -> J e. 2ndc ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3exp2 | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( x C_ X -> ( x ~<_ _om -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X -> J e. 2ndc ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_imp4a | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( x C_ X -> ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) -> J e. 2ndc ) ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_syl5 | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( x e. ~P X -> ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) -> J e. 2ndc ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_rexlimdv | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( E. x e. ~P X ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) -> J e. 2ndc ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 15 | #P_impbid | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( J e. 2ndc <-> E. x e. ~P X ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) = X ) ) ) |
